segments.text: Hello , how can I help you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to open a Current Account , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , please fill in a Deposit Slip . All you need to do is to write the amount here and your name over here , on this line . I'll take care of the rest . First , could I see some ID ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great , here you are . This is my passport .
segments.speaker: S2
